overview: Every comedy lover's dream, this specially commissioned DVD contains the best moments from the history of comedy at the BBC. Featuring the finest humour from some of the most well-respected performers from shows like Only Fools and Horses, Morecambe and Wise, Blackadder, Hancock, One Foot in the Grave and Are You Being Served to name but a few.  With over eighty minutes of classic comedy, highlights include Tony Hancock at the blood donor's clinic, Del Boy taking a tumble through the bar, and Morecambe and Wise doing their kitchen striptease routine.
title: Classic Comedy Moments
